name: What The Frog
description:
"Lovable" — Touch Arcade
"Surprisingly fun" — iosDroid
"Love this game" — Phonecats

Hello, Frog. Don’t touch the phone.
Tap beside the iPhone or touch it to shake the screen, and make "What" jump through his ultra low resolution adventure.
You will be fired by micro quests that can be done within a few seconds. Or maybe not?

How many micro quests can you survive? Challenge the world in Game Center!
